meanings.definition: The act of putting a plan or decision into effect.
meanings.sent1: The implementation of the new rule was successful.
meanings.sent2: The company's implementation of the safety measures improved the work environment.
meanings.sent3: The implementation of the surprise party was flawless.
meanings.sent4: Her implementation of the marketing strategy was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's implementation of the lesson plan made learning fun and engaging.

meanings.definition: The process of carrying out or accomplishing something.
meanings.sent1: The implementation of the project required teamwork.
meanings.sent2: Efficient implementation of the plan led to its success.
meanings.sent3: The implementation of the bake sale was a piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: Her implementation of the plan was as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The implementation of the new software streamlined the workflow.

meanings.definition: The act of fulfilling or completing a task or project.
meanings.sent1: The implementation of the construction project finished ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: Successful implementation of the plan brought great results.
meanings.sent3: The implementation of the puzzle was a satisfying challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her implementation of the novel was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The implementation of the event left everyone impressed.
